Here's some additional information:

I looked back to see if any of the oth=
er Matlab demos would run.  There are several files 
(some of the ignite fi=
les) that still run.  In looking at the code, they don't reference the xml =

files in the same way.  Clearly, the connections to Matlab are not complet=
e.  Any ideas 
where to go from here?  Thanks.

Rusty

> --- In cantera@yahoogroups.com, Dave Goodwin <dgoodwin@> wrot=
e:
> >
> > It looks to me like you have more than one Python installation. =
Be  
> > sure to run the script setup_cantera to set environment variable  =

> > PYTHON_CMD to the Python interpreter used to install Cantera. If you  =

> > installed a version of Python yourself, but the system Python  
> > in=
trpreter in /usr/bin comes first in PATH, this sort of problem will  
> > o=
ccur.
